DOC.HEADLINE: Libya lifts visa ban on Schengen zone citizens

TEXT.P: SIRTE, Libya, March 27 (Xinhua) - Libya Foreign Ministry announced on Saturday that the country has lifted the ban on visas for citizens of the Schengen zone.

"In the interests of strengthening its cooperation with the European Union, Libya lifts the restrictions it earlier imposed on the citizens of the Schengen zone," the foreign ministry said in a statement.
